p.p: A subset of SNOMED CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent different types of assessment that may be carried out with an individual (for example falls assessment, speech assessment, neurological assessment etc...).

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK AssessmentType subset with subset original id 5971000000136.

p.p: The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of the "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
